item.title: The grass isn't greener on the other side. The grass isn't greener because you're not watering it
item.description: The grass isn’t greener on the other side. The grass isn’t greener because you’re not watering it Stop complaining. Do action.

item.title: The Great Stagnation - How America Ate All the Low-Hanging Fruit of Modern History, Got Sick, and Will (Eventually) Feel Better
item.description: The Great Stagnation - How America Ate All the Low-Hanging Fruit of Modern History, Got Sick, and Will (Eventually) Feel Better Politics has recovered far earlier than jobs We have not recovered jobs in the same way, [[Jobless Recovery]] Republicans are often more fiscally disastrous than Democrats when running policy We are at a technical plateau for the past 40 years, slowing economic growth The Lower Free fertile land Ambitious workers immigrated to work the land Technological Breakthroughs Telephone, mass production, television, etc.

item.title: Cantril Ladder of Life
item.description: Cantril Ladder of Life Asks individuals to imagine a ladder with different steps where the top step is the best possible life, the bottom step is the worst possible life, and individuals are asked which step they’re on.

item.title: If You Want to Get Super Rich, It Will Happen Quickly, Not Slowly
item.description: If You Want to Get Super Rich, It Will Happen Quickly, Not Slowly You can get rich slowly with a high-paying job, but getting super rich often requires quick and exponential growth.
